Verses: 1 yoseppin Kumaaranaagiya Manaaseyin Kudumbangalil, Manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerin Maganaana Kileyaaththukkup Pirandha Eperukkup Puththiranaayirundha Seloppiyaaththin Kumaaraththigalaagiya Maklaal, Novaal, Oklaal, Milkaal, Thirsaal Enbavargal Vandhu,
2 aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Mosekkum, Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukkum, Prabukkalukkum, Sabaiyanaiththirkum Munbaaga Nindru:

3 engal Thagappan Vanaandharaththil Maranamadaindhaar; Avar Karththarukku Virodhamaagak Koodina Koraakin Koottaththaaril Serndhavar Alla, Thammudaiya Paavaththinaale Mariththaar; Avarukkuk Kumaarar Illai.

4 engal Thagappanukkuk Kumaaran Illaadhadhinaale, Avarudaiya Per Avarudaiya Vamsaththil Illaamal Atruppogalaamaa? Engal Thagappanudaiya Sagodhararukkulle Engalukkuk Kaaniyaatchi Kodukkavendum Endraargal.
5 mose Avargaludaiya Nyaayaththaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduponaan.
6 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

7 seloppiyaaththin Kumaaraththigal Sollugiradhu Saridhaan; Avargalukku Avargal Thagappanudaiya Sagodhararukkulle Sudhandharam Kodukkavendum; Avargal Thagappan Pinvaiththa Sudhandharaththai Avargalukkuk Kidaikkumpadi Seyvaayaaga.
8 melum Nee Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Oruvan Kumaaran Illaamal Mariththaal, Avanukkuriya Sudhandharaththai Avan Kumaaraththikkuk Kodukkavendum.
9 avanukku Kumaaraththiyum Illaadhirundhaal, Avanukkuriya Sudhandharaththai Avan Sagodhararukkuk Kodukkavendum.
10 avanukku Sagodhararum Illaadhirundhaal, Avanukkuriya Sudhandharaththai Avan Thagappanudaiya Sagodhararukkuk Kodukkavendum.

11 avan Thagappanukku Sagodharar Illaadhirundhaal, Avanukkuriya Sudhandharaththai Avan Vamsaththile Avanukkuk Kittina Uravinmuraiyaanukkuk Sudhandharamaagak Kodukkavendum; Idhu, Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye, Isravel Puththirarukku Nyaayavidhippramaanamaai Irukkakkadavadhu Endru Sol Endraar.
12 pinbu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Indha Apaareem Malaiyil Eri, Naan Isravel Puththirarukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththaip Paar.
13 nee Adhaip Paarththapinbu, Un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Serkkappattadhu Pola, Neeyum Un Janaththaaridaththil Serkkappaduvaai;

14 sabaiyaar Vaakkuvaadhampannina Seen Vanaandharaththil Thanneerukkaduththa Vishayaththil Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Ennaip Parisuththampannavendiya Neengal En Kattalaiyai Meerineergale Endraar. Idhu Seen Vanaandharaththil Kaadhes Oor Aruge Undaana Meripaavin Thanneerukkaduththa Kaariyame.
15 appozhudhu Mose Karththarai Nokki:
16 karththarudaiya Sabai Meyppan Illaadha Mandhaiyaippol Iraadhapadikku,

17 andha Sabaikku Munbaagap Pokkum Varaththumaai Irukkumpadikkum, Avargalaip Pogavum Varavum Pannumpadikkum, Maamsamaana Yaavarudaiya Aavigalukkum Dhevanaagiya Karththar Oru Purushanai Avargalmel Adhigaariyaaga Erpaduththavendum Endraan.
18 karththar Moseyai Nokki: Aaviyaip Petrirukkira Purushanaagiya Yosuvaa Ennum Noonin Kumaaranai Nee Therindhukondu, Avanmel Un Kaiyai Vaiththu,
19 avanai Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukkum Sabaiyanaiththirkum Munbaaga Niruththi, Avargal Kangalukku Munbaaga Avanukku Kattalaikoduththu,
20 isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Avanukkuk Keezhppadiyumpadikku, Un Ganaththil Konjam Avanukkuk Kodu.

21 avan Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukku Munbaaga Nirkakkadavan; Avanimiththam Andha Aasaariyan Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Vandhu, Ooreem Ennum Nyaayaththinaale Aalosanai Ketkakkadavan; Avarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye, Avanum Avanodekooda Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Pogavum Avarudaiya Kattalaiyinpadiye Varavum Vendiyadhu Endraar.
22 mose Thanakkuk Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye Yosuvaavai Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avanai Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukkum Sabaiyanaiththirkum Munbaaga Niruththi,
23 avan Mel Than Kaigalai Vaiththu, Karththar Thanakku Sonnapadiye Avanukkuk Kattalaikoduththaan.
